!Sentry Altima: May the Song of the west wind bring you rest in the night. I am Sentry Altima. I admit that I have a soft nature. I applied to become a Sentry to change my cowardly character. Now, as you can see, I have been reborn as a strong Sentry. If you follow this path that I guard, you can go out towards the *Dark Forest.* [npc_%objectId%_Chat 1|Ask about the Dark Forest] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
